DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate safety immunogenicity oral vaccine prevent avian influenza . Volunteers receive either one two dos research vaccine placebo part study .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Oral Vaccine Prevent Avian Influenza
DOC.criteria: In good health establish medical history , physical examination laboratory test time enrollment . Has vaccine within past 8 week . Has prior H5 avian influenza investigational vaccine . Current history chronic alcohol consumption and/or illicit and/or recreational drug use . History autoimmune related disease . History confirm suspected immunodeficient immunosuppressive condition ( congenital acquire condition impedes normal immune response , concurrent immunosuppressive therapy ) . Positive serology HIV , HCV , HBV . Previous serious reaction vaccination anaphylaxis , respiratory problem , hive abdominal pain . History irritable bowel disease inflammatory digestive gastrointestinal condition could affect intend distribution safety evaluation orally administer vaccine target mucosa small intestine . Use proton pump inhibitor ( Nexium , Prilosec ) substantially increase stomach pH . Stool sample occult blood baseline exam
